properties.name: ledger.audit.log-all-changes
properties.description: Enable logging of all audit changes.

properties.name: ledger.audit.retention-days
properties.description: Number of days to retain audit logs.

properties.name: ledger.chart-of-accounts.enforce-balance-types
properties.description: Enforce balance types for chart of accounts.

properties.name: ledger.chart-of-accounts.max-depth
properties.description: Maximum depth for account hierarchy.

properties.name: ledger.chart-of-accounts.account-number-format
properties.description: Format pattern for account numbers.

properties.name: ledger.journal-entry.require-approval
properties.description: Require approval for journal entries.

properties.name: ledger.journal-entry.auto-reverse-days
properties.description: Days after which to auto-reverse journal entries.

properties.name: ledger.reconciliation.max-age-days
properties.description: Maximum age in days for reconciliation items.

properties.name: ledger.reconciliation.auto-match-threshold
properties.description: Threshold for automatic matching in reconciliation.

properties.name: ledger.accounting.currency.supported
properties.description: List of supported currencies.

properties.name: ledger.accounting.currency.default
properties.description: Default currency for accounting.

properties.name: ledger.accounting.currency.exchange-rate-provider
properties.description: Provider for exchange rates.

properties.name: ledger.reports.max-export-rows
properties.description: Maximum number of rows for report export.

properties.name: ledger.reports.async-generation
properties.description: Enable asynchronous report generation.

properties.name: security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and validation.

properties.name: security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: services.payment-service.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for payment service calls in milliseconds.

properties.name: services.payment-service.url
properties.description: URL for payment service.

properties.name: services.transaction-service.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for transaction service calls in milliseconds.

properties.name: services.transaction-service.url
properties.description: URL for transaction service.

properties.name: services.auth-service.timeout
properties.description: Timeout for auth service calls in milliseconds.

properties.name: services.auth-service.url
properties.description: URL for auth service.

properties.name: service.auth.client-id
properties.description: OAuth2 client ID for service authentication.

properties.name: service.auth.client-secret
properties.description: OAuth2 client secret for service authentication.
